data.title: Dance of the Wind (Rajan Khosa) 1997 â€“ Indiancine.ma
data.meta_description: Director: Rajan Khosa; Writer: Rajan Khosa, Robin Mukherjee; Producer: Karl Baumgartner, Jacques Bidou, Raimond Goebel, Keith Griffiths, Suresh Jindal, Pan Nalin, Phil van der Linden; Cinematographer: Piyush Shah; Editor: Emma Matthews; Cast: Ami Arora, Roshan Bano, Kitu Gidwani, Bhaveen Gosain, B.C. Sanyal, Abbas Tyrewala, Paakhi A. Tyrewala, Kapila Vatsyayan; Duration: 01:22:13; Aspect Ratio: 1.750:1; Hue: 15.119; Saturation: 0.166; Lightness: 0.199; Volume: 0.145; Cuts per Minute: 5.752; Summary: The mother of the Indian female singer Pallavi (Kitu Gidwani) is at the end of her life. She was master and teacher for her daughter for the art of Indian singing. But she will not be able to complete her lessons. So Pallavi experiences the lack of the guru of her mother. Finally she finds him in a very young street-girl who is able to sing marvelously. But this girl keeps disappearing again and again...
data.text:
